gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.service
Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService

This service interface is used to manage user access to the caaers UI.

Method Detail

createOrUpdateCSMUserAndGroupsForResearchStaff

void createOrUpdateCSMUserAndGroupsForResearchStaff(ResearchStaff researchStaff,
                                                    java.lang.String changeURL)
Create the csm users and groups for newly created research staff or updates csm users/groups if research staff already exists.

Parameters:
researchStaff - the research staff for which csm users and groups to be created or updated
Throws:
CaaersSystemException - if CSM user can not be created.
